DOCU_Docu.DOC:
About Automic's Oracle_SOA Package ================================
Manage SOA composite application deployments to a Oracle SOA server using these actions * Start Application * Stop Application * Activate Application * Deploy Application * Undeploy Application
=Supported Fusion Middleware versions=
Currently the following Application Servers are supported:
* Oracle SOA Suite 12c (12.1.3)
=Setup=
* Java JDK 1.7 or higher must be installed and executeable as 'java'.
* The Agent to execute the wsadmin tool will be the OS Agent. The executing OS Agent is expected to be on the Oracle SOA Suite Server.
* Set environment variable ORACLE_HOME to the WebLogic home directory.
=Rollback= These actions do not support rollback.
